short_description: Peppermint oil roller ball - 100% natural peppermint essential oil to experience the invigorating scent and powerful benefits. Sourced from the finest peppermint plants, this essential oil is perfect for aromatherapy on your skin

Nausea Relief - Our Peppermint Essential Oil Roll-On is perfect for relieving morning nausea, making it a must-have for pregnancy. The soothing menthol in peppermint helps ease queasiness and provides fast, natural relief

Aromatherapy oil - Enjoy the benefits of peppermint oil for tension relief. Apply to your temples, forehead, or neck to experience the calming and invigorating effects. Perfect for use during travel or whenever you need a quick pick-me-up.

Safety precaution - For external use only. We recommend patch testing before use. Apply to clean skin on the inside of your elbow or wrist. Cover and leave for 24 hours. Discontinue use if redness or rash appears.

name: Plant Therapy Kids Nighty Night Essential Oil Blend for Sleep 10 mL (1/3 oz) Pre-Diluted Roll-On 100% Pure, Natural Aromatherapy, Therapeutic Grade
short_description: A NATURAL WAY TO RELAX: Struggling to calm your agitated kid before bedtime? KidSafe Nighty Night all-natural essential oils blend can take your child from chaotic to calm and sleepy, gently carrying him to dreamland. Apply topically to your child’s chest or back of their neck about 30 minutes before bedtime.

DEVELOPED ESPECIALLY FOR KIDS: Our potent blend of undiluted, 100% pure KidSafe essential oils includes Lavender, Marjoram Sweet, Mandarin, Cedarwood Atlas, Patchouli, Clary Sage, Chamomile Roman, and Blue Tansy. Simply add a few drops into carrier oils and bubble baths to create a calming bedtime routine which is key to a good night's sleep.

BATCH SPECIFIC GC-MS REPORTS ON EVERY OIL: Every bottle of oil from Plant Therapy goes through multiple rounds of testing including organoleptic testing and multiple rounds of GC-MS testing by several third-party laboratories.

HIGH-QUALITY AFFORDABLE ESSENTIAL OILS: At Plant Therapy our goal is to positively impact the lives of as many people as we possibly can, by selling such a high quality product at an affordable price. Be confident knowing you are purchasing quality oils at direct-to-consumer prices.

CERTIFIED AROMATHERAPISTS ON STAFF: Our customers are our #1 priority and we’d love for you to join the Plant Therapy Family. Our Certified Aromatherapists are happy to help you with all of your Essential Oil questions. We want you to be confident and satisfied with your purchase.

name: Edens Garden Stress Relief Essential Oil Roll-On Blend- 100% Pure Premium Grade, Natural, Therapeutic, Aromatherapy, Kid & Skin Safe, The Best for Comfort, Relaxation Pre-Diluted 10 ml (.33 fl oz)
short_description: CITRUS SERENITY- Experience the invigorating fusion of Sweet Orange, Bergamot, Patchouli, Grapefruit, and Ylang Ylang in our Stress Relief Essential Oil Roll-On. This essential oil blend greets your senses with a calming aroma and citrusy notes that can help clear your mind and boost your mood. Every inhale promises a moment of serenity, making it an ideal companion for your busy lifestyle.

WELLNESS BENEFITS- Our Stress Relief Essential Oil Roll-On is more than just a pleasant scent. Formulated with a blend of Sweet Orange, Bergamot, Patchouli, Grapefruit, and Ylang Ylang essential oils, it is designed to help you regain your calm and balance during stressful moments. This essential oil blend aims to provide a soothing atmosphere that encourages relaxation and offers a sense of well-being.

CONTAINS 100% PURE ESSENTIAL OIL INGREDIENTS- Sweet Orange (Citrus sinensis), Bergamot (Citrus bergamia), Patchouli (Pogostemon cablin), Grapefruit (Citrus paradisi), Ylang Ylang (Cananga odorata) diluted in Fractionated Coconut Oil (Cocos nucifera)

WAYS TO USE- The Stress Relief Essential Oil Roll-On is ready to use whenever and wherever you need it. Simply roll it onto your wrists, temples, or the back of your neck, and allow the calming aroma to envelop you. It's a portable, easy-to-use solution for those seeking a natural approach to stress management. Whether you're at work, on-the-go, or unwinding at home, this essential oil blend can be your go-to tool for a tranquil respite. Diluted to 10% in Fractionated Coconut Oil. Its compact design makes it travel-ready or keeping in your bag for immediate use. Enjoy the simplicity and convenience of our Stress Relief Essential Oil Roll-On.

PREMIUM & AFFORDABLE ESSENTIAL OILS: At Edens Garden, we're committed to enhancing lives with top-tier products within everyone's budget. Our high-grade essential oils are offered at accessible prices, promising value and excellence.

WOMAN OWNED & FAMILY OPERATED SINCE 2009: With over 250 distinct essential oils and blends, we pride ourselves on personally sourcing each essential oil to ensure affordability without compromising our high standards. Our broad selection of sustainable home and body products has crowned us the leading essential oil company. We're delighted to serve as your trusted source for all things aromatherapy.

MEET OUR LICENSED AROMATHERAPISTS: Caring for our customers is at the core of Edens Garden. We invite you to join our community and let our team of licensed Aromatherapists assist with all your essential oil needs. Remember, your wellness journey has a companion in us!
